Cake - Character Animation Kickass Editor.

HomeWiki:
Project Description
Cake - Character Animation Kickass Editor.

A new fantastic editor and animation library for creating animations for use in games.

Currently supports XNA and Silverlight.

Latest video showing off some usage and features:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8sYkeu5k7XE

How to get it up and running

  1. Sync it! For example, to a folder named cake.
  2. Open this solution: cake\CharacterAnimationEditor\CakeWPF\CakeWPF.sln
  3. Build!
  4. Run!

It should find the sample project automatically. The above video will probably get you started poking around. :)

Requirements

You need Visual Studio 2010 and XNA Game Studio 4.0:
  • http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?FamilyID=9AC86ECA-206F-4274-97F2-EF6C8B1F478F
